scripts.init:public: npm run rm:public && npm run mkdir:public
scripts.start: npm run cp:html && npm run postcss -- -w -d public & npm run budo
scripts.budo: budo src/js/index.js:index.js --dir public -s public -olv -- -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 stage-0 react ] ] --extension='.jsx' | garnish
scripts.build:js: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 stage-0 react ] ] -t envify --extension='.jsx' -p licensify src/js/index.js | uglifyjs -m -c warnings=false --comments '/This header is generated by licensify/' -o public/index.js
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production npm run cp:html && npm run build:js && npm run build:css
